snippet: House Republicans said that chaos in the first nine days of open enrollment under President Obama’s health care law would justify a delay in major provisions of the law.
abstract: House Republicans said that chaos in the first nine days of open enrollment under President Obama’s health care law would justify a delay in major provisions of the law.

headline.main: House Republicans Argue for Delay in Health Law Penalties
headline.print_headline: Exchanges’ Flaws Justify Law’s Delay, G.O.P. Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
